name: B.U.G (Barking Ultimate Game)
description:
If you beat the game you can either comment it or tweet the ending to me at @Dev_Maniakevin ! so I can see who can speedrun the game the fastest haha

(if you beat it once, you keep your skills, so you can dash and use all that in the beginning)

Controls (Keyboard or xbox one controller)
WASD / Arrows/Left Joystick
Z / B in controller- to Bark and drive away the cats

Up arrow or  A to jump

Left mouse click or A to keep dialog

Left shift/X to dash (when unlocked)

E/Y in controller to interact in the shop

L to kill the player in case it gets stuck in a platform

You are a dog and you need to get that sweet food, so you go to fight the bug that stole it from you.
